ball.name: Great Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Ultra Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Net Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× for Bug or Water Pokémon. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Dark Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× for Dark Pokémon. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Illusion Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× for Ghost or Psychic Pokémon. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Bumi Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× for Rock or Ground Pokémon. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Crystal Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× for Ice Pokémon. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Steel Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× for Steel Pokémon. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Mystery Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. It has random successful rate. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Poké Ball Secret
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 35% for secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Secret Ball Secret
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 50% for secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Ultra Ball Secret
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 65% for secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Lure Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 5× for Pokémon that live in water-edge. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Dusk Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 5× for Pokémon that live in cave. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Dive Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 5× for Pokémon that live in sea. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Fast Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 5× for Pokémon with 100 or greater base speed. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Heavy Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. If the wild Pokémon weighs 200 kg or more, success rate is 3×. If the wild Pokemon weighs 300 kg or more, success rate is 4×. If the wild Pokemon weighs 400 kg or more, success rate is 5×. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. It doesn't affect to wild secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Pika Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a Pikachu. Success rate is 100%. It doesn't affect to anything Pokémon except Pikachu.

ball.name: Heavy Ball Secret
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. If the wild secret Pokémon weighs 200 kg or more, success rate is 45%. If the wild Pokemon weighs 300 kg or more, success rate is 60%. If the wild Pokemon weighs 400 kg or more, success rate is 75%. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Mega Stone Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 85% for Mega Evolve Pokémon and only 1% for all other secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Galar Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 85% for Galar Pokémon and only 1% for all other secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Alola Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 85% for Alola Pokémon and only 1% for all other secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Hisui Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 85% for Hisui Pokémon and only 1% for all other secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Beast Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 85% for Ultra Beast Pokémon (Nihilego, Buzzwole, Pheromosa, Xurkitree, Celesteela, Kartana, Guzzlord, Poipole, Naganadel, Stakataka, Blacephalon) and only 1% for all other secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: G-Max Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 85% for Gigantamax Pokémon and only 1% for all other secret Pokémon. It doesn't affect to wild non-secret Pokémon.

ball.name: Master Ball
ball.desc: A BALL thrown to catch a wild Pokémon without fail.
